Examples
========

The following examples demonstrate the usage of OpenMPC.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :glob:

   examples/cessna_descent.ipynb
   examples/constraint_softening.ipynb
   examples/discretization_notebook.ipynb
   examples/double_integrator.ipynb
   examples/helicopter.ipynb
   examples/index.ipynb
   examples/invariant_sets.ipynb
   examples/multiple_shooting_pendulum_swingup.ipynb
   examples/nonlinear_tracking_heat_exchanger.ipynb
   examples/Offsetfree_advanced.ipynb
   examples/offset_free_mpc_heat_exchanger.ipynb
   examples/offset_free_simple.ipynb
   examples/reference_tracking_aircraft.ipynb
   examples/simpleMPC_invPend.ipynb
   examples/single_shooting_pendulum_swingup.ipynb
   examples/swingup_pendcart_nlmpc.ipynb
